amendatorysection.para: An appropriate version of the Statutory Short Forms of Acknowledgment as prescribed by section 64-206 shall suffice for acknowledgment of any statutory short form prescribed by the Nebraska Short Form Act which is permitted or required to be acknowledged. An appropriate version of the Statutory Short Forms of Acknowledgment as prescribed by section 64-206 with the expression, the foregoing instrument was verified, substituted in place of the expression, the foregoing instrument was acknowledged, shall suffice for verification of any statutory short form prescribed by the act or for verification of any other document all or any part or parts of the contents of which is or are permitted or required to be verified.
